Package toy.crypto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DigitalSignature
    An interface that any signature should implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockDS
    A class that implements the digital signature of blocks.
    DigestMethod
    A class to that implements the hashing method (using SHA-256).
    PkiUtils
    A class that implements the logic of the PKI infrastructure.
    SslUtils
